summary: Exploring the design and structure of systems, the theme of architecture on this page includes a deep dive into the concept of 'ecosystem architecture.' This refers to the application of decentralized and non-hierarchical organizational principles to create thriving networks. Through interdisciplinary approaches, the resources aim to foster understanding of how architecture can transcend traditional boundaries in both spatial and temporal dimensions.
excerpt: This article explores the evolving concept of ecosystems, emphasizing the need for 'ecosystem architecture' to foster decentralized, non-hierarchical organizations across space and time.
